gadget.name: Demarrage
gadget.command: gadgetUnReal("Demarrage") gadgetReal("titleBarPanel") gadgetReal("unitStatPanel") gadgetReal("ResourceBg") gadgetReal("UnitStatsBg") gadgetReal("UnitBuildBg") gadgetReal("UnitQueueBg") uiFindType("settlementsThatTrainVillagers") uiCreateNumberGroup(9) tis("Villager Norse") tis("Villager Egyptian") tis("Villager Greek") tis("Villager Atlantean") uiToggleBuildingQueue uiFindType("Hyena of Set") uiCreateNumberGroup(2) uiFindType("AbstractPharaoh") uiCreateNumberGroup(4) uiFindType("AbstractScout") uiCreateNumberGroup(1) uiFindType("AbstractVillager") uiAddSelectNumberGroup(6) uiFindType("AbstractVillager") uiAddSelectNumberGroup(6) uiFindType("AbstractVillager") uiAddSelectNumberGroup(6) uiFindType("AbstractVillager") uiAddSelectNumberGroup(6) uiFindType("AbstractVillager") uiAddSelectNumberGroup(6) uiRemoveFromAnyNumberGroup tis("Granary") tis("Guild")

gadget.name: NFort
gadget.mouseovertext: Nombre de forts de la colline

gadget.name: armyBanner
gadget.mouseovertext: $$18409$$Form an Army by selecting units and right clicking on an empty banner.

gadget.name: buttonBarPanel-menuButton
gadget.mouseovertext: $$18410$$Click on this icon to see the in-game menu.

gadget.name: unitStatPanel-RepeatQueue-button
gadget.mouseovertext: $$23753$$Click this button to repeat current build queue.

gadget.name: unitStatPanel-stat-normalAttack
gadget.mouseovertext: $$22033$$Hack attack -- Damage done by most hand-to-hand weapons, such as swords and axes.

gadget.name: unitStatPanel-stat-crushAttack
gadget.mouseovertext: $$22032$$Crush attack -- Damage done by siege weapons and myth units against buildings.

gadget.name: unitStatPanel-stat-pierceAttack
gadget.mouseovertext: $$22031$$Pierce attack -- Damage done by most ranged weapons, such as bows and slings.

gadget.name: unitStatPanel-stat-normalArmor
gadget.mouseovertext: $$22030$$Hack armor -- The percentage of damage absorbed from hack attacks, such as swords and axes.

gadget.name: mainBackgroundBar-flareButton
gadget.mouseovertext: $$18424$$Click this button, and then click in the world to send a flare to all other players.

gadget.name: mainBackgroundBar-sandTableButton

gadget.command: echo("This will bring up the sandtable eventually.")

gadget.mouseovertext: $$18425$$Click this button to return to your Town Center
